text: The Encoder agent converts internal UDRs to raw data. It is a processing agent for batch and real-time workflow configurations. The main difference between these two modes of operation is that within a batch workflow, the Encoder agent is capable of adding headers and trailers. For more information on the Ultra format, see Introduction to the Ultra Format Definition Language . The section has the following subsections: Encoder Agent Configuration Batch Workflow Encoder Agent Transaction Behavior Batch and Input/Output Data Encoder Agent Configuration Real-time Workflow Encoder Agent Services Batch Encoder Agent Meta Information Model and Events
title: Encoder Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
